directions: In a large bowl wash arugula, endives, and radicchio in several changes of cold water and spin dry. In a serving bowl whisk together vinegar, mustard, and salt to taste and whisk in oil in a stream until emulsified. Add greens and toss to coat with vinaigrette. Season salad with pepper and toss again.
ingredients: 3 Belgian endives, cut crosswise into thirds and leaves separated
2 medium heads radicchio, torn into bite-size pieces
1 1/2 tablespoons malt vinegar* or Sherry vinegar*
freshly ground black pepper to taste
*available at specialty food shops and some supermarkets
title: Arugula, Endive, and Radicchio Salad with Mustard Vinaigrette
